name: Dark Indigo #1
description:
The "Shades of Chromos" collection is a hand-drawn set of 120 miniatures.

Each miniature is monochromatic, and drawn with one of the pencils of the Faber-Castell oil-based "Polychromos" color pencils set.

Each scene depicts a sphere. Or several ones. Sometimes other shapes. Most of the time they are solid. Only one of them is translucent. Every single of them is happily levitating in a perfect mini-world. A sky, a Sun, and an infinite Ground.
